mapper.sql: household_id, user_id, category_id, deposit, payment, note, active_date, create_date, update_date, delete_date
mapper.insert: insert into M_HOUSEHOLD( household_id, user_id, category_id, deposit, payment, note, active_date, create_date, update_date, delete_date ) values ( #{householdId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{categoryId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deposit, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{payment, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{note, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{activeDate, jdbcType=DATE}, #{createDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deleteDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.select: select sum(deposit) as deposit, sum(payment) as payment from M_HOUSEHOLD where user_id = #{userId, jdbcType=INTEGER} and active_date between #{startDate} and #{endDate}

select mh.household_id, mh.user_id, mh.category_id, mh.deposit, mh.payment, mh.note, mh.active_date, tc.category_code as category_category_code, tc.subcategory_name as category_subcategory_name from M_HOUSEHOLD mh INNER JOIN T_CATEGORY tc ON mh.CATEGORY_ID = tc.CATEGORY_ID where mh.user_id = #{userId, jdbcType=INTEGER} ORDER BY mh.ACTIVE_DATE DESC LIMIT 8;
